“Nel, distract it!” You shout.

“What?”

“Hit it with something and run!” You respond.

“Careful!” Kainzo calls. “That eye looks like a ranged attack!”

It's getting closer, and you watch Nel leap down from the stair-rail and hit it in the leg. His iron knives basically bounce off, completely harmlessly, and the massive golem turns toward him, slamming a fist down hard enough to crack the glass beneath it.

That doesn't bode well. He freezes for a second before bounding off, the enormous creature in tow. “C'mere, ugly!”

“Gunner.” Nearby, you hear Dorian—what has that motherfucker even been doing? “Behind you.”

“No way, really!?” Vyx responds sarcastically, turning to face her attackers. They're almost upon her, but Dorian leaps forward, raising his staff and discharging a blade of air, visible, withering, in the direction of the Watchers. It doesn't travel far, but...
